alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 11:30AM CST until March 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi...Louisiana... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson, Concordia and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO FRIDAY, MARCH 25... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...From this evening to Friday, March 25. * IMPACTS...At 48.0 feet, Carthage Point Road becomes impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 47.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 49.0 feet Saturday, March 19. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 47.8 Wed 11 am CS 48.1 48.2 48.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CST.
